meanings.definition: To make a new design for something.
meanings.sent1: I will redesign my room to make it look more colorful.
meanings.sent2: She decided to redesign her website for a fresh look.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer had to quickly redesign the dress before the show.
meanings.sent4: The artist had to redesign his painting after receiving feedback.
meanings.sent5: The architect had to redesign the building plans due to new regulations.

meanings.sent1: The redesign of the logo was well-received by the company.
meanings.sent2: The redesign of the office layout improved productivity.
meanings.sent3: The sudden redesign of the menu confused the customers.
meanings.sent4: The redesign of the garden transformed it into a beautiful space.
meanings.sent5: The redesign of the packaging made the product more appealing.
